attributes.action: Outlaw the ownership and breeding of Pit Bull terriers in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pit Bull terrier has to go. it has become a status symbol for Gang culture and they are frequently being used to attack and terrify innocent victims in gang and Anti social crimes. We don't need this type of dog on our shores, it is not native to the UK and serves no purpose exept to intimidate and scare the public.
